author: Gambardella, Matthew
title: XML Developer's Guide
description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

author: Ralls, Kim
title: Midnight Rain
description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

author: Corets, Eva
title: Maeve Ascendant
description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

author: Corets, Eva
title: Oberon's Legacy
description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

author: Corets, Eva
title: The Sundered Grail
description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

author: Randall, Cynthia
title: Lover Birds
description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

author: Thurman, Paula
title: Splish Splash
description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

author: Knorr, Stefan
title: Creepy Crawlies
description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

author: Kress, Peter
title: Paradox Lost
description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

author: O'Brien, Tim
title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

author: O'Brien, Tim
title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

author: Galos, Mike
title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.

author: Smith, John
title: The Quantum Enigma
description: A physicist discovers a parallel universe while experimenting with quantum entanglement.

author: Doe, Jane
title: Love in the Time of Databases
description: A data analyst finds love while working on a big data project.

author: Lee, Alice
title: The Last Algorithm
description: A story about the creation of the world's most powerful algorithm.

author: Brown, Dan
title: The Lost Symbolic Key
description: A cryptographer races to solve a series of mysterious codes.

author: Nguyen, Linh
title: Dragon's Code
description: A young mage must decipher an ancient code to save her kingdom.

author: Patel, Ravi
title: The Mumbai Heist
description: A detective investigates a high-profile bank robbery in Mumbai.

author: Garcia, Maria
title: Echoes of the Past
description: A journey through time reveals secrets of an ancient civilization.

author: Kim, Soo-jin
title: The Silent Forest
description: A group of friends encounters supernatural forces in a haunted forest.

author: Ivanov, Alexei
title: Cosmonaut Dreams
description: A Russian cosmonaut dreams of life beyond the stars.

author: MÃ¼ller, Anna
title: Berlin Shadows
description: A tale of survival and hope in post-war Berlin.

author: Johnson, Emily
title: The Art of SQL
description: A comprehensive guide to mastering SQL for data professionals.

author: Williams, Mark
title: The Forgotten Island
description: An explorer discovers a mysterious island lost to history.

author: Chen, Wei
title: The Jade Emperor's Secret
description: A quest to recover a lost artifact leads to a battle between gods and mortals.
